title: Microsoft Corp. stock outperforms competitors on strong trading day
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.15%
       rose 1.43% to $409.72 Monday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        -0.14%
       rising 0.76% to 4,927.93 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        -0.77%
       rising 0.59% to 38,333.45. Microsoft Corp. hit a new 52-week high, surpassing its previous peak of $407.01, which the company reached on January 25th. The stock outperformed some of its competitors Monday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        +0.53%
       fell 0.36% to $191.73, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +2.04%
       rose 0.68% to $154.84, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +2.15%
       rose 0.87% to $153.51. Trading volume (23.2 M) remained 2.5 million below its 50-day average volume of 25.7 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. Gold’s run to all-time highs could spell trouble on the inflation outlook, some analysts say.
